name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Michael J. PISKANIN, Petitioner v. Honorable Kelly L. BANACH and Honorable William H. Platt and District Attorney James B. Martin, Esq., and Tammy Ferguson, as Facility Manager and Warden SCI Benner, Respondents

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Michael J. PISKANIN, Petitioner v. Honorable Kelly L. BANACH and Honorable William H. Platt and District Attorney James B. Martin, Esq., and Tammy Ferguson, as Facility Manager and Warden SCI Benner, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of April, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the “Application for Emergency Relief’ is DENIED, and the Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the jurists’ names form the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
112 A.3d 1209
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Michael J. PISKANIN, Petitioner v. Honorable Kelly L. BANACH and Honorable William H. Platt and District Attorney James B. Martin, Esq., and Tammy Ferguson, as Facility Manager and Warden SCI Benner, Respondents.
No. 44 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 8, 2015.
